info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 12 at 9:37AM MST until September 12 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
TORFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Apache County in northeastern Arizona...
* Until 1100 AM MDT.
* At 1037 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Window Rock Airport, or 47 miles southeast of Chinle, moving northeast at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Window Rock Airport, Window Rock, Hunters Point and St. Michaels.
This includes State Route 264 between mile markers 472 and 475.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 10:00 AM MST. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 10:00 AM MST. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 10:00 AM MST. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 10:00 AM MST. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
